Package stores

Class PaymentMethodStorage

Object
PaymentMethodStorage
public class PaymentMethodStorage extends Object
The PaymentMethodStorage class is responsible for storing and managing payment methods. All methods and fields are static.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final String
    paymentMethodDataPath
    The file path where the payment method data is stored.
    private static HashMap<String,PaymentMethod>
    paymentMethods
    A HashMap that stores payment methods.

      The file path where the payment method data is stored.
      See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PaymentMethodStorage

      public PaymentMethodStorage()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static void add(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Adds a payment method to the storage.
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - The payment method to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the paymentMethod is null or if a payment method with the same name already exists.

    • remove

      public static void remove(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Removes a payment method from the storage.
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - The payment method to be removed.

    • update

      public static void update(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Updates a payment method in the storage.
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - The payment method to be updated.

    • get

      public static PaymentMethod get(String name)
      Retrieves a payment method from the storage based on its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the payment method.
      Returns:
      The payment method with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • getAll

      public static PaymentMethod[] getAll()
      Retrieves all payment methods from the storage.
      Returns:
      An array of all payment methods in the storage.

    • save

      public static void save()
      Saves the payment methods to the storage.

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads the payment methods from the storage. If the storage file does not exist, creates a new storage with default payment methods.

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears all payment methods from the storage.
